data.title: The Summer I Turned Pretty season 2 soundtrack: Every song in the series
data.meta_description: Episodes 1-3 of The Summer I Turned Pretty season 2 are now available to stream and the soundtrack boasts a wealth of talent, including Taylor Swift.
data.text:
Belly and co are back for season 2 of The Summer I Turned Pretty, the Prime Video series based on Jenny Han's best-selling novel series.

Advertisement

Fans of the show now have eight shiny new episodes to enjoy – that's one more than season 1's offering – with the love triangle between Belly, Conrad and Jeremiah once again taking centre stage.

There's also the "return of Susannah's cancer" and an "unexpected visitor" who "threatens the future" of the beloved Cousins house.

As with the drama's first outing, the soundtrack contains loads of great tunes: from Taylor Swift (Album), Olivia Rodrigo, Angel Olsen and more, with a song for every mood and occasion.

The first three episodes of The Summer I Turned Pretty season 2 arrived on Prime Video on Friday, 14th July. The rest of the episodes will air weekly – so check this page each week for fresh soundtrack updates.
